title: 148.106 PEER REVIEW OF SERVICES AND FEES.
text:
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
[Repealed, 2001 c 121 s 7]
All data and information acquired by the board or the peer review committee before August 1, 2001, in the exercise of its duties and functions in conducting peer reviews before August 1, 2001, shall be subject to the same disclosure and confidentiality protections as provided for data and information of other review organizations under section 145.64. The data, information, and records are classified as private data on individuals for purposes of chapter 13. The patient records obtained by the board pursuant to this section must be used solely for the purposes of the board relating to peer review or the disciplinary process.
